 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחִי‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Song.1.10|Song 1:10]]</sup> ==jaw, cheek== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לוֺחָא‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; on Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***la—û***</u></abbr> compare [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 375</sup>, but <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr> ?); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> absolute [[Judg.15.17|Judg 15:17]]; [[Mic.4.14|Mic 4:14]] construct [[Judg.15.15|Judg 15:15]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶ֑חִי‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.24|1Kgs 22:24]] + 3 t. + [[Judg.15.19|Judg 15:19]] (twice in verse); ***suffix*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֱיוֺ‎</span> [[Job.40.26|Job 40:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֱיָהּ‎</span> [[Lam.1.2|Lam 1:2]] dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחָיַיִּם‎</span> [[Deut.18.3|Deut 18:3]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחָיֵי‎</span> [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחָיַי‎</span> [[Isa.50.6|Isa 50:6]], compare [[Job.16.10|Job 16:10]], etc.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Hos.11.4|Hos 11:4]] — 

**1.** ***jaw, jawbone***, of animal, [[Judg.15.15|Judg 15:15]]; [[Judg.15.16|Judg 15:16]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.15.17|Judg 15:17]] (under jaw of ass), compare proper name, of a location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַת לֶ֑חִי‎</span> v[[Judg.15.17|Judg 15:17]] in simile <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלּלְֿחֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּמְרִימֵי עֹל‎</span> [[Hos.11.4|Hos 11:4]] ***like those lifting up a yoke from upon*** (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> ?) ***their jaws*** (Israel under figure of oxen); of sacrificial ox or sheep [[Deut.18.3|Deut 18:3]] of crocodile [[Job.40.26|Job 40:26]] of Pharaoh under figure of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.29.4|Ezek 29:4]] (compare v[[Ezek.29.3|Ezek 29:3]]); compare [[Ezek.38.4|Ezek 38:4]]; [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]]. 

**2.** ***cheek***, of man [[1Kgs.22.24|1Kgs 22:24]] = [[2Chr.18.23|2Chr 18:23]]; [[Job.16.10|Job 16:10]]; [[Ps.3.8|Ps 3:8]]; [[Song.5.13|Song 5:13]]; [[Isa.50.6|Isa 50:6]]; [[Lam.3.30|Lam 3:30]]; [[Mic.4.14|Mic 4:14]] of woman [[Song.1.10|Song 1:10]]; [[Lam.1.2|Lam 1:2]] (figurative of Jerusalem).
